column4: I ve added the url "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/openoffice-pkgs/ubuntu hardy main" to my source list, but I dont know if it is a good idea to trust a scribbler team :)
If you want opinions or want to take a poll this is the wrong place.. but I would not add other repos
you re right, but the Ubuntu team takes  too long to set OpenOffice free.
